title: Knowledge Graph Symbol Entry
description: Schema for a single symbol (function or class) in the knowledge_graph.json file.

key.description: The unique identifier for the symbol (e.g., 'path/to/file.py::MyClass').

name.description: The name of the function or class.

file.description: The relative path to the source file.

agent.description: The inferred agent responsible for this symbol's domain.

capability.description: The high-level capability this symbol provides, or 'unassigned'.

intent.description: A clear, concise statement of the symbol's purpose.

docstring.description: The raw docstring from source code.

calls.description: List of other functions called by this one.

entry_point_type.description: Type of entry point if applicable (e.g., 'fastapi_route_post').

is_class.description: True if the symbol is a class definition.

base_classes.description: A list of base classes this symbol inherits from (if it is a class).

entry_point_justification.description: The name of the pattern that identified this symbol as an entry point.

parent_class_key.description: The key of the parent class, if this symbol is a method.
